definition: war on all sides (idiom); fighting from all four quarters
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack

sentences.english: This is a heroic company which fought on many fronts in the Liberation War.
sentences.chinese: 這是一支解放戰爭中經過南征北戰的英雄連隊。

sentences.english: Have you enjoyed being involved in the Champions League squad and travelling with the team?
sentences.chinese: 你很高興自己入選冠軍盃陣容和球隊一起南征北戰嗎？

sentences.english: This is a heroic company which fought on many fronts in the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 這是一支抗日戰爭中經過南征北戰的英雄連隊。
